directions: Heat oil in a large nonstick pan. Add onion, pepper, celery, carrots, and beans. Cook over medium heat until vegetables are tender yet crisp, about 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, peas, artichokes, garlic, and tarragon and cook 2 minutes longer. Add tomato juice and bring to a simmer. Add spinach and simmer 1 minute longer. Season with salt to taste. Serve over couscous or rice, if desired.
ingredients: 1 red or yellow bell pepper, cored, seeded and chopped
1 cup green beans, cut into 1-inch lengths
1 cup artichoke hearts (4 hearts or a small jar) in brine, drained and quartered
1 tbsp chopped fresh tarragon leaves (about 5 sprigs) or 1 tsp dried tarragon
title: Vegetable Ragoût
